column4: The audio of my ubuntu works whenever it wants ! :( Any suggestions?
remove pulseaudio? just a suggestion, it stored per app audio settings
apt-get remove pulseaudio ?
you can try, if it doens help reinstall
write down what is removed so you can install it again later
from the Sound Settings in System -> Preferences i here the test sound with ALSA config. but i cant here any other sound
use alsamixer in the terminal to set mixer settings
sorry, i do here sounds from youtube for example
sudo apt-get install alsa-oss
installing
Now it works! :)
of course
what is alsa-oss ?
oss is an older sound system that is used by some legacy appliations
alsa-oss makes sure that oss is also supported
you can also find out by doing: apt-cache show alsa-oss
and why it is not installed by default ?
no idea
Uhmmm now Amarok or Audacious doesnt work. Amarok says audio device is busy
restart the applications
I did. Maybe if i restart the pc?
give it a try
everything ok ! :) Thanks!
glad it works now
